resources.string:
● Engaged = The robot is on the charge station and it’s balanced. (The lights are on) 
 	 ● Docked = The robot is on the charge station but it isn’t balanced. (The lights are NOT on) 
 	 ● Parked = The robot is not on the charged station, but it’s in the community zone. 
 	 ● Single Pickup = The human player station where a game piece is dropped down a ramp. 
 	 ● Double Pickup = The human player station where the robot can pick up a game piece off of a ledge.

1. Check the match number and the position assigned to you on the scouting schedule. 
 	 2. Enter your name, the robot number, and the robot position. 
 	 3. Start in the Auto section. 
 	 4. Watch your assigned robot, filling out the fields associated with your robot’s actions. 
 	 5. When the first bell rings, go to the Tele-Op section. 
 	 6. Repeat step 4 
 	 7. When the game is over, go to the Endgame section and fill out the boxes. 
 	 8. Go to the Notes section, and input any notes.
